description.value:
This candle's magic is activated when the candle is lit, which requires a Magic|XPHB action. After burning for 4 hours, the candle is destroyed. You can snuff it out early for use at a later time. Deduct the time it burned in increments of 1 minute from its total burn time. While lit, the candle sheds Dim Light|XPHB in a 30-foot radius. While you are within that light, you have Advantage|XPHB on D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests. In addition, a Cleric or Druid in the light can cast level 1 spells they have prepared without expending spell slots. Alternatively, when you light the candle for the first time, you can cast Gate|XPHB with it. Doing so destroys the candle. The portal created by the spell links to a particular Outer Plane chosen by the DM or determined by rolling on the following table.

Attunement: true
